price: 55. « Nous t’avons annoncé la vérité. Ne sois donc pas si désespéré ! »
arabic: قَالُواْ بَشَّرۡنَٰكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ فَلَا تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلۡقَٰنِطِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qālū basharnāka bil-ḥaqi falā takun mina al-qāniṭīna
